clean_handle.description: Clean the handle to ensure proper functioning.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid to ensure it is free from any contaminants.

open_lid.description: Open the lid by rotating it in continuous motion.

close_lid.description: Close the lid by rotating it in continuous motion.

clean_dispenser_body.description: Clean the dispenser body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_dispenser.description: Clean the entire dispenser including the handle, lid, and body.
